sampleDescriptions: Implementation of a virtual physical therapy health system at VA to provide lower cost and higher care quality.

Telemedicine - Physical therapy services for Veteran primary care and Federal Government Employees workers comp claims providing cost savings, care expansion and enhanced quality of healthcare.
